title: Slash Trouble
html:
header("Location: http://google.com"); // goes to http://google.comheader("Location: http:/google.com"); // goes to http://yourdomain.com/google.com

Try it out:

  • header("Location: http:/google.com"); -> http://kendsnyder.com/google.com
  • header("Location: http://google.com"); -> http://google.com
  • <a> with href = http:/google.com -> http://kendsnyder.com/google.com
  • <a> with href = http://google.com -> http://google.com
